title: small wheels
body: add? please?  smaller wheels to create a motorcycles fnd small cars
author: Hahaalexey

comments.body: github issues are not for feature requests.

title: [bug] suspension losing all power when reassembling a vehicle
body:
When disassembling then reassembling a car with the VS Eureka Mod the suspension completely breaks until the blocks for the wheels/tracks are broken and replaced. 

Create 0.5.1.f
Trackwork 1.0.1-beta
VS Eureka Mod 1.5.1-beta
author: Hastagaspatcho

comments.body: Disassembly is a mistake and it never should've existed

title: Wheels break into wheel parts
body:
Version: 1.20.1-1.0.1

When you break a Wheel either by hand or with wrench it drops a Wheel Part instead of a Wheel.
author: MiroslavTsvetomirovPavlov

title: Fabric port
body: Is a Fabric port planned? I'm tired of having to use Forge, some of my favorite mods (like Replay mod) aren't on forge, and it would be pretty interesting to use it to create a epic tank combat video.
author: Miner34dev

comments.body: No. I don't know how to use the fabric API and I do not have the resources to maintain a fabric port. You are welcome to ask someone else to try, there is at least one person working on one right now.

title: Wheels and Tracks don't work correctly on mini vehicles
body: Create a vehicle with Valkyrien Skies's mini ship creator item, the put wheels/tracks on it. It will start flying around like crazy, and even the creative gravitron can have issues keeping it steady. This is even more easy to see on smaller (created using the mini ship creator multiple times) vehicles.
author: Miner34dev

comments.body: I may support scale in the future. For now its too much effort.

title: Wheel and Track issue
body:
Forge 1.20.1 1.0.1-beta, Diesiel+VS2&Clockwork mods

Wheels and Tracks can't deassemble properly. The block's physics remain but doesn't want to function.

Love this mod thank you the tracks look immaculate. It'd be awesome if this mod can spice up the survival gameplay with some smaller wheel variants? & perhaps a redstone link into the recipe of the wheel as a servo, takes building space when making smaller vehicles
author: Kostovo

comments.body:
> Wheels and Tracks can't deassemble properly. 

Disassembly is a nightmare. I recommend against doing it at all.

> The block's physics remain but doesn't want to function.

I'm sorry but this doesn't make sense to me, how can it have physics when disassembled?

> It'd be awesome if this mod can spice up the survival gameplay with some smaller wheel variants?

Unlikely. 

> & perhaps a redstone link into the recipe of the wheel as a servo

I'm still considering how to tackle this problem. What you suggested is an ok idea (and I have thought of it) but doesn't solve a bunch of other issues that become very apparent with trackwork.

title: 1.19.2 port
body: Since a 1.19.2 port isnt going to be official is it ok if I make one? Do I need to do anything paperwork-wise? And If I'm clear, can you point me in the direction of how to update it?
author: collatzcoder

comments.body: paperwork is crazy. Trackwork is MIT Licensed, and if you don't know porting workflow its best to leave it to someone that does.

title: Intitial 1.20.1 Update by rocketstrong
body: had some free time so i updated the mod to "1.20.1". I have redone the build scripts and did as much of the code migration as i could. i do believe there is a problem with one of the mixins still and some logic changes in Valkarian skies those do appear to be causing a few issues.
author: rocketstrong600

comments.body: the mixins may be fine it was an earlier message reporting mixing in to a deprecated function that i am reporting on.

> some logic changes in Valkarian skies those do appear to be causing a few issues.

Could you list out these issues if they still exist?

once i found the actual vs core and vs match-up for the VS beta 5 released on Modritnth the issues went away. just typical vs bugs that exist with other addons. I did encounter the track being stuck on without any connection to a create rotation source but didn't have the debugger going and haven't been able to reproduce.
